author: Spc. Trevares Johnson
title: Starting the Year with a Bang! Iron Thunder Hosts FIRES Ball in Poland [Image 3 of 5]
text:
Dedicated soldiers from the Charlie Company, 4th Battalion, 27th Field Artillery Regiment, 2nd Armored Brigade Combat Team, 1st Armored Division, share their holiday cheer with the company 1st Sgt. during the battalions St. Barbara’s Day Ball held in Toruñ, Poland on December 28, 2023. The celebration featured a range of observances, including a slideshow of pivotal battalion events, traditional celebrations, and recognition of outstanding service by unit members. (Photo by U.S. Army Spc. Trevares Johnson)
